body.name: Retro Game Console, HAND LAND Classic Mini Video Game Consoles Built-in with 620 Games Dual Players Mode Console with 2 Controllers Handheld Games for Kids & Adults
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 34 mins.
features: 🎮 CLASSIC RETRO GAME CONSOLE - Retro game console, built-in 620 kinds of classic game get you and your family back to childhood happiness. Aaction, sports, puzzles, fighting, and racing,the best games of the past few decades are on this console, and many adults may be nostalgic. These games are challenging, engaging, and full of fun.

🎮 BEST HOME ACTIVITY FOR KIDS - Classic game console can enhance the communication between parents and children by let your children experience your growing experience and happines. Equipped with 2 sensitive controller, plug and play, comfortable hand feel, you can better share your fun with family or friends, along with original sound for a better playing experience.

🎮PLUG AND PLAY - This console has an AV output. Make sure your TV/monitor has AV input connectors. Simply connect the game console to the power supply with the charger, then connect it to the TV using an AV cable and connect the controllers. Turn on, start playing now. Tips: it does not go back to the menu when you press “select + start” together. So you have to press RESET on the machine every time you want to switch a game.

🎮NOTES - This is a third-party product, not the original console. These classic games do not have the same clear image as today’s games on the big screen, and may not be compatible with some 4K monitor （HDMI & Wireless is not supported）, but they are still so exciting and challenging to play!

🎮MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We are confident that you and your kids will love this retro game console. This is why we are offering you 30 days no-hassle, money-back guarantee, if anything gets damaged or requires replacement, pls feel free to contact us.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.2 3.2 out of 5 stars 74 ratings 3.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow. Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Talk about bringing back memories!I played the original Nintendo daily as a kid growing up. I got this for my 5-year-old daughter for Christmas. There's so many games on it, games I forgot about, games I've never seen and games that I've been wanting to play again! The picture isn't super clear like what we're used to these days but it's like it was back in the day and it doesn't bother me at all, my daughter loves it and it's so much fun spending time with her playing these games and teaching her all about paper boy and Mario and Tetris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my kids who solely want to play the easy, old school Mario type games. Everything is in Chinese, the graphics and HORRIBLE, and the lack of buttons makes it nearly impossible to use. Complete waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it!
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this for our 6 yr old (well...maybe for Mom & Dad too haha) He is used to playing Daddys PS5. Clearly, this is alot different...but it is definitely worth the money and we have already had so much fun with it. Of course it's not what they are used to these days...but we knew that when we purchased. Now we are all "fighting" over whose turn it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My partner was so excited to get this game and it never even worked. He also went out to buy a HDMI cord that didn’t even come with the product and still did not work. So additional money and still no games. Horrible warning do not purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this game to relive some childhood memories. Overall it’s OK. It is a bit pixelated, but I guess that’s to be expected for the price. The controller also lags a bit when trying to navigate through some of the games but I enjoy playing overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nintendo retro 620 juegos
reviews.reviewText: Bueno apesar de que hubo un inconveniente de un retraso por dos semanas hoy por fin llegó es lo que esperaba juegos de mis tiempos perfecto para jugar en familia se los recomiendo valió la pena esperar tanto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars defective - mini usb power adapter port is too loose causing power to continually turn off
reviews.reviewText: This console is a nice idea, although it requires a HDMI adapter in order to hook up to most new TVs. However, the mini usb power adapter and adapter port are junk, so the unit continually loses power because the port is so loose. I will try my luck with a replacement if the seller can exchange

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great game and easy!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a couple of our kids in military service. Great price point, loaded with old school games and very compact too. Great add!
